item.description:
SAT MAY 15 â€“ 8pm The Man Who Came To Dinner at Cheney Hall with Little Theatre of Manchester

The Man Who Came to Dinner, by George S. Kaufman and Moss Hart
Directed by Joseph Keach-Longo
A famous commentator is in town for a speaking engagement. Invited to your home for dinner, he slips on the icy stairway and is unable to leave as he rehabilitates for an excruciatingly long time. He takes over your home, commandeers the telephone, all the while a host of crazy friends and staff come and go! Add an Egyptian sarcophagus, an octopus, some penguins and you have not the plot of the latest reality television show, but The Man Who Came To Dinner. Slide on in and get ready to laugh!

The CT Theatre Group will meet before and after the show

Little Theatre of Manchester
at Cheney Hall
177 Hartford Road
Manchester, CT 06040

Tickets are $22

WE HAVE A VERY LIMITED NUMBER OF TICKETS IN THE CT THEATRE GROUP SECTION
THIS EVENT WILL SELL OUT - GET YOUR TICKET NOW


Pick up your ticket before the show with the CT Theatre Group, or at the will call window


Visit http://www.CTTheatreG... or call (860) 987-7888

From 84 East or West: Take 384 Eastbound to exit 3. Go right at end of ramp. Take a left at first light (Hartford Road). Cheney Hall is about 1/2 mile on Right. Go past building and take a Right on Pine Street into the parking lot. From 384 Westbound: Take exit 3. Turn left and continue straight through stop light (Hartford Road). Cheney Hall is about 1/2 mile on Right. Go past building and take a Right on Pine Street into the parking lot.
item.how_to_find_us: The CT Theatre Group will meet before and after the show to extend the party Details will be emailed to all CT Theatre Group Ticket Holders
